data.title: Lee Crawford Sensei @ Bond St Dojo Feb 21
data.meta_description: Lee Crawford Sensei @ Bond St Dojo Feb 21-23 /2020 The Bond Street Dojo community are excited to welcome Lee Crawford Sensei (ASU 6th dan) from Seattle for an exciting weekend seminar, Feb 21-23. Please join us for her wonderful connected teaching and precise technical skill.
data.text:
Aikido seminar series

The Bond Street Dojo community are excited to welcome Lee Crawford Sensei (ASU 6th dan) from Seattle for an exciting weekend seminar. Please join us for her wonderful connected teaching and precise technical skill.

This will be a fundraiser seminar for the dojo. Thank you all for the support!

Pre-registration $100 | $120 at the door | $35 per class

CLASS / KEIKO SCHEDULE – 稽古予定 (Tentative)

FRIDAY, February 21, 2020

5:30PM Registration

6:30 – 8:30PM Keiko 稽古

SATURDAY, February 22, 2020

9:45AMRegistration

10:00AM – 12:00PM Keiko 稽古

LUNCH BREAK (Outside the dojo)

2:00PM – 4:00PM Keiko 稽古

*Afternoon/Evening Social at Richard Sensei’s home in Brooklyn- Shhh! Celebrating Richard Webb Sensei 20 years of practice with his first teacher...

SUNDAY, February 23, 2020

11:00AM Registration

11:30AM – 1:30PM Keiko 稽古

Followed by a brunch provided by the dojo

Lee Crawford Sensei, 6th Dan, is Chief Instructor at Aikido Northshore. Crawford Sensei began her aikido training in 1980 under the direction of Akira Tohei Shihan at the University of Wisconsin Aikido Club. After relocating to Seattle in 1988, she became the Assistant Chief Instructor for George Ledyard Sensei at Aikido Eastside in Bellevue, WA. In 1995 Crawford Sensei opened Aikido Northshore in Kirkland, WA.

Crawford Sensei has trained extensively under the direct instruction of Mitsugi Saotome Shihan and Hiroshi Ikeda Shihan. She also includes Kevin Choate Sensei and Patty Saotome Sensei as having strong influences on her aikido.

In 2014 Crawford Sensei was awarded the Ueshiba Juku designation by Saotome Shihan. This honor identifies those who are in a direct line of succession from O'Sensei through Saotome Shihan.

Video courtesy of George Ledyard Sensei's Youtube channel

Photos courtesy of Aikido Northshore

The Bond Street Dojo

161 E 106 StreetNew York, NY 10029 United States

Phone: 212-477-0899
